subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Pendleton, a Michigan State fullback whose main role is to block for running backs, has only four receptions this year, but they are among the biggest of the season for the Spartans.
snippet: Pendleton, a Michigan State fullback whose main role is to block for running backs, has only four receptions this year, but they are among the biggest of the season for the Spartans.
